attributes.action: Allow all town and community council meetings to be filmed to allow easier access by local people to their councils and to ensure rules and regulations are followed properly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would request that council meetings are allowed to be filmed. As a local councillor, you notice that not all people are able to make council meetings and I feel it would be advantageous for people to be able to access their council meeting through other media than actually attending the meetings. This filming would also help to prevent code of conduct issues and standing orders issues between council members/public etc.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
